alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:57PM MST until July 31 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST FOR CENTRAL SANTA CRUZ COUNTY... At 356 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Patagonia Lake State Park, or 10 miles northeast of Nogales, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Patagonia and Patagonia Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
